name: Leo Sports
description: A multi-sport facility in Shivganga Layout, Mahadevapura, offering indoor badminton courts with rental equipment and flexible booking options, ideal for both casual players and serious practice.

contact.address: Site No. 11/3, 11/4, 11/5, Shivganga Layout, Near Mahadevapura, Outer Ring Road, Bangalore 560048

highlights: Indoor badminton courts bookable via Playo
Equipment rentals available‚Äîrackets and shoes (socks required)
Venue frequently hosts tournaments like 'Namma Badminton' and 'Rising Stars'
Convenient location and extended operating hours

facilities.name: Indoor Badminton Courts
facilities.description: Synthetic-surface courts available for public booking.

facilities.name: Equipment Rental
facilities.description: Rackets and non-marking shoes available for rent (bring socks).

facilities.name: Tournaments & Events
facilities.description: Hosts community tournaments like 'Namma Badminton' and 'Rising Stars'.

achievements: Frequent venue for local badminton tournaments
Reliable booking and active community engagement
